author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Get ready to be inspired! Find out more about Fred. at the ‘Birmingham CRUISE Show 2015’ – Stand D30, NEC, Saturday 12th / Sunday 13th September 2015Travelandtourworld.com
text:
Get ready to be inspired! Find out more about Fred. at the ‘Birmingham CRUISE Show 2015’ – Stand D30, NEC, Saturday 12th / Sunday 13th September 2015 Published on : Thursday, September 3, 2015
Award-winning Fred. Olsen Cruise Lines will have a team of experts on hand at stand D30 at this Autumn’s ‘Birmingham CRUISE Show 2015’, to be held at the NEC on Saturday 12th and Sunday 13th September 2015, ready to inspire and inform visitors about the right kind of Fred. Olsen cruise for them.
The ‘Birmingham CRUISE Show 2015’ will be held from 10am to 5pm on Saturday 12th September 2015 and from 10am to 4pm on Sunday 13th September 2015. The popular event provides a showcase for the cruise industry, giving visitors in and around the Midlands who are interested in cruising a flavour of the different types of cruise holiday available to them.
Visitors booking a Fred. Olsen holiday on the day at the ‘Birmingham CRUISE Show 2015’ can save up to an extra £325 per person off published brochure fares and special offers. In addition, one of the Fred. Olsen team will be giving a presentation on ‘The Fred. Olsen Difference’.
There will also be the chance for visitors to the Fred. Olsen stand to win a cruise prize for two adults – a mini-cruise for two people, of four nights’ duration – by entering a prize draw.
Fred. Olsen’s four more traditional, intimate ships – Balmoral, Braemar, Boudicca and Black Watch – visit over 200 destinations around the world, and in 2016/17, will be sailing from ten convenient, regional UK departures ports: Southampton, Dover, Harwich, Tilbury, Falmouth, Liverpool, Newcastle, Rosyth (for Edinburgh), Greenock (for Glasgow) and Belfast.
Source:- Fred Olsen Cruise Lines
